State.Author: DonKnotts
State.Description: 13 years ago I started retexturing the various parts of the game that bothered me the most, calling it Textures Over Time as I was adding more textures as I finished individual things to a point I felt was good enough to share with other people. After a very long break I have started once again, and will be uploading some replacement textures.
State.Name: Textures Over A Very Long Time
